post:
<img src="http://getkvm.com/logo_black.png" />
<hr>
Founded in 2012, GetKVM consists of a small team of like-minded individuals that specialize in providing infrastructure as a service. We're a UK based company with a key focus on service reliability, efficient support and product affordability. 

We have PoP's in Europe and the United States, utilizing premium data center facilities with fully redundant power, cooling and network connectivity. Each facility offers best path routing, allowing users to get to your sites or services with less hops and lower latency. We use premium blends of bandwidth to allow excellent cross-continent connectivity.
<hr>
**KVM Packages (Available in Düsseldorf and New Jersey)**

>**<i>KVM256</i>**
256MB Dedicated RAM
14GB RAID10 HDD Storage
500GB Monthly Transfer (in/out)
Access To 1x vCPU Core(s)
1x Dedicated IPv4 Address
1x Dedicated IPv6 Address
FREE Subdomain (.getkvm.eu)
Basic Support Package
99.97% Uptime SLA
**RRP:** £4.10/month
**LET: £2.46/month** (40% OFF with promotion code DWYZU9755I)

https://getkvm.com/client/cart.php?a=add&pid=52 (NJ)

<hr>
**Account Features**
<ul>
<li>Automatic power cycling</li>
<li>Historical usage statistics</li>
<li>RAID Protected storage space</li>
<li>72 Hour money back guarantee</li>
<li>Setup within one business day!</li>
<li>Simple monthly billing, cancel any time</li>
<li>Full rDNS support on both IPv4 and IPv6</li>
<li>Free ".getkvm.eu" subdomain upon request</li>
<li>Automatic operating system re-installations</li>
<li>99.97% Uptime SLA (KVM) and best effort SLA (OpenVZ)</li>
<li>24/7 Service monitoring from over 30 physical locations</li>
<li>Self-managed support (Software and administration support is not included in your price)</li>
<li>Manage all of your virtual servers (Regardless of type or location) from one control panel</li>
</ul>

Thank you for reading, if you have any questions please feel free to email us at sales@getkvm.com, contact us via PM @GetKVM_Ash or respond to this thread!
